meanings.definition: A traditional Japanese garment with wide sleeves and a wraparound design.
meanings.sent1: She wore beautiful kimonos during the festival.
meanings.sent2: In Japan, kimonos are often worn on special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The kimonos at the store were so colorful and elegant.
meanings.sent4: Her kimonos floated around her like delicate wings.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the kimonos mesmerized everyone.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'kimono'.
meanings.sent1: They each owned several kimonos in their collection.
meanings.sent2: The display featured a variety of kimonos from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The kimonos on the rack seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The kimonos piled up in the room, creating a colorful mountain.
meanings.sent5: The kimonos hanging in the closet added a touch of elegance to the room.
